mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: SeaSense is dedicated to advancing ocean research and conservation through innovative technologies. We provide real-time monitoring and analysis of ocean conditions to support scientific research, environmental protection, and sustainable ocean management.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a world in which ocean ecosystems are understood, protected and thriving. Through data-driven insights and collaborative research, we aim to contribute to the health and sustainability of our oceans for future generations.

technology.title: Our Technology.
technology.description: SeaSense uses a network of advanced sensors distributed throughout the ocean. These sensors continuously collect data on various parameters including temperature, pH levels, CO₂ concentrations, and more. Our platform processes this data to provide valuable public information to anyone who wants to access it.

team.title: The Team
team.description: SeaSense is developed by the Planck Team, a group of students at Max Planck in Treviso, Italy. Our interdisciplinary approach combines expertise in computer science, biology and chemistry, combined with mechanics and automation, to create innovative solutions for ocean monitoring and analysis.

Map.title: SeaSense

Index.title: SeaSense
Index.subtitle: Listening to the Ocean's Whisper
Index.description: Dive into comprehensive ocean data analysis, research, and monitoring. Let the sea understand itself like never before.

realTime.title: Real-time Analysis
realTime.description: Monitor ocean conditions with live data streams and advanced analytics

research.description: Access powerful tools for marine research and data visualization

global.title: Global Coverage
global.description: Study oceans worldwide with comprehensive geographical data
